Recipe.title: Oatmeal Peanut Butter Blocks
Recipe.Source: From the Kitchen of Mrs. Boat
Recipe.Note: Head Lunch Lady at Ransom's Elementary School
Recipe.Description: When Ransom was in Cherry Hill Elementary School, the head cook was an immigrant named Mrs. Boat. Her name was pronounced "Boot". This recipe is for one of the favorite treats that she made.

section.instruction: In a large mixing bowl, cream together Butter, White Sugar and Brown Sugar.
Blend in Baking Soda, Salk, Vanilla, Egg and Peanut Butter.
Press dough evenly into a 9&inch; &by; 13&inch; pan.
Remove from oven and immediately sprinkle with Chocolate Chips.
Let stand for 5 minutes, then, using a spatula, spread the soft Chocolate Chips evenly across the top.
Mix Frosting ingredients together, then spread evenly across the top.
Let cool, then cut into rectangles about 2&inch; &by; 3&inch;.

Notes.note: Letting the Chocolate Chips sit for 5 minutes on the hot cookie makes them soften. It is pretty cool to see Chocolate Chips, then start spreading and see Chocolate
